returns.price: The price at the given timestamp

returns.isStale: Whether the price data is stale

getLastUpdateTime(address,address).notice: Get the last update timestamp for a token pair

getPrice(address,address).notice: Get the current price of a token pair

getPriceAtTime(address,address,uint256).notice: Get the price at a specific timestamp

isPriceStale(address,address).notice: Check if price data is stale
